Tod,
can you comment why you think it is in Search? I use standard API to open the
file and it seems to crash somewhere down in the workbook.

Please "reassign to owner of selected component" after commenting.
Thanks.

I moved to search because the call is from SearchResultViewer. I'll move it to 
the person responsible for editors.

I find this difficult to reproduce, but I will turn on the tab list again and
see if it occurs again.

Channing

If you can recreate this defect in the latest 2.1 builds please reopen this 
defect. 

Note setTabList() has nothing to do with the editor dropdown list.
